actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two Claw attacks and one Tail attack, or it makes three Icicle Shard attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 15 (3d6+5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Icicle Shard
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Devilish Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The devil is resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. In addition, it is immune to fire damage and poison damage and to the poisoned condition.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The devil has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Snow Walk
special_abilities.desc: The devil can move across icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. In addition, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.
